title: What is the interpretation of the living’s dream of Ibn Sirin calling the dead?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream calling the living to the dead. The science of dream interpretation depends on certain foundations and concepts that differ from one interpreter to another. Sheikh Ahmed bin Sirin is considered one of the most famous interpreters of visions and dreams in the modern era, and he relied on it when interpreting a dream about a dead person. I contacted him about the social and psychological state of the pioneer, as well as the state in which the deceased appeared in a dream, and because the appearance of the deceased in dreams is one of the disturbing visions, so today he presented the most important interpretations of the dream of reviving the call of the dead. So follow us. Interpretation of the dream of the living calling the dead by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the dream in which the living call the dead? Whoever dreams of calling the dead to give him new clothes, this indicates that he will become wealthy one day, and the opposite is true if the clothes are old. If the deceased ignores the call of the living and speaks to Another person, then this is an undesirable sign of betrayal of a lover or husband, if the visionary is close. When she makes an appointment to meet the dead in a woman’s dream, this symbolizes the sin she is currently committing and she must return to God and ask Him for forgiveness and pardon. Call to father or mother The dead person indicates the righteousness of his parents in this world and the hereafter and their satisfaction with whoever sees him. It also indicates the integrity of his condition and the path to success. As for calling to the dead, it means honesty, sincerity, and life in his memory. Whoever sees a dream in which the living invites the dead in a dream, it is an indication of the intensity of longing for the dead, and this is just self-talk, and the subconscious has depicted it in the form of a dream, and here the divine can visit the dead in his grave and He calls upon him for mercy and forgiveness. If the conversation of the living continues with the deceased for a long time, this is good news for him about the long life he will spend in obedience to God. Seeing the call of the living to the dead in a dream and refusing to listen to it is considered a bad omen of the accumulation of worries and the increase of obstacles in the path of its owner. Interpretation of a dream about calling the living to the dead by Ibn Sirin. According to what was stated in the books of interpretation of dreams by the scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing the dreamer calling himself dead carries meanings of goodness, hope and optimism for its owner. Whoever suffers from a serious illness and dreams of calling the dead, this is good news for him of recovery, the disappearance of diseases, and the enjoyment of a strong structure and good health. As for the prisoner’s dream, the dream foretells that he will do so. They are separated from captivity, the end of distress, and the attainment of freedom. If one sees that he is calling for a dead person and he is really worried or facing financial difficulties, and the deceased answers him and talks to him, then this is evidence of relieving distress, alleviating anxiety, paying off debts, and starting a new stage without problems. If the dreamer tries to call the deceased and he answers, then all his sayings will be fulfilled, he is in the abode of truth, but the dreamer is in the abode of lies and falsehoods. Hearing the dead call the living and returning to give him something is a good indication of many good things and ample livelihood that await him in the future and that he will receive On her in ways he does not expect. To dream of a man calling a dead woman and asking him to marry her, means a successful business and reaping a lot of profits behind it and the luxury of life, or the dream is...

title: Interpretation of hatred and hate in a dream - Seeing hatred in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of conflict and disagreement between two people in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of disgust. Interpretation of a dream of enmity and hatred. Interpretation of a ball in a dream. In a dream, it is the cause of hostility. Enemies do not love each other and do not cooperate, and hatred for those we love. Hatred and hatred appear in the breasts. Perhaps hatred indicates the command to obey and refrain from disobedience. Interpretation of hatred in a dream: Hatred: not to be praised, for love is a blessing from God Almighty, and hatred is its opposite, and the opposite of blessing is distress. God Almighty mentioned his end to the believers by removing the established hostility between them through the love of Islam, so the Almighty said: If you were enemies, He would unite your hearts, and by His grace you would become brothers. In a dream, it is the cause of hostility, as enemies do not love each other and do not cooperate, and hatred for those we love shows hatred and hatred in the breasts. Perhaps hatred indicates the command to obey and refrain from disobedience. Interpretation of hatred in a dream. If you dream that you hate someone, this means that you are not careful. You will inadvertently cause harm to the party, or a dishonest act will cause you to lose work and stress. And if they hate you for unfair reasons, you will find loyal and kind friends. Your buddies will have more fun. On the other hand, this dream portends illness. Interpretation of hatred for someone in a dreamIf you dream that you hate someone, this means that you will have a strange hatred for someone and the validity of your doubts about his honesty will become clear. If you think that others despise you, this portends that your good intentions towards others will turn into selfishness. If a girl dreams that her lover hates her, this foretells that she will love a man who does not suit her at all. Interpretation of oppression in a dream. Oppression in a dream is a wise man and a wise planner who treats people kindly and does not go extravagant or wasteful. Interpretation of hatred in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream in the name of a specific person for senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream by the name of a specific person: Seeing the name of a known or unknown person in a dream has many implications depending on the person's social status, whether he is married, single, divorced or widowed, so we will list all the interpretations in detail today on the site. Various in the article Interpretation of dreams by the name of a specific person. Interpretation of a dream by the name of a specific person in a dream: The interpretation of dreams refers to the name of a specific person in a dream, and you know the name in the dream, in an event that will appear before you and you will recognize it. Seeing a person marrying a woman he knows means that he will receive a lot of good news in life. Seeing a person you know die in a dream means an ordeal. Seeing a specific man in a dream shows the dreamer's relationship with that man. Seeing a person doing bad deeds in a dream means that many problems will appear in the present and the future. Interpretation of a dream by the name of a specific person in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a man in a dream is a sign of hiding something from you. If one sees that he is marrying the owner of the name in a dream, this is a sign of the happy news that he will receive soon. Seeing the name of a friend in a dream is a sign of good luck in work or life in general. Dreaming of a specific person in a dream is a sign of social and family connection with this The person. Seeing a certain person doing something bad is a sign of many problems and sorrows. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Abdullah in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin: The name Abdullah in a dream is a sign of contemplation, worship, and closeness to God Almighty. Seeing the name Abdullah in a dream indicates the good and beautiful qualities of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the name Abdullah in a dream for a single girl is a sign of her good morals. Interpretation of a dream with the name of a certain person such as the name Abdullah in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her marriage to a righteous man. Interpretation of seeing the name Saud in a dream: The meaning of the name Saud in a dream is a sign of the abundance of good for this person. Saud in a dream shows the happy news that he will receive. The name Saud in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams for the dreamer. If an unmarried girl sees the name Saud in a dream, this is evidence of optimism and happiness in her life. Interpretation of a dream with the name Saud for a married woman: The name Saud in a dream means happiness and good news. Interpretation of a dream with the name Saud for a married woman indicates the happy news that she will receive. Seeing a married woman named Saud in a dream means success and achieving dreams. The name Saud for a married woman indicates sustenance and bliss. Interpretation of seeing the name Aya in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the name A verse in a dream is a sign of good news and a threat from God Almighty. Seeing the name Aya in a dream indicates the dreamer's mercy, provided that his behavior is good and he draws closer to God Almighty. Dreaming of the name Aya in a dream is good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the name Aya in a dream is a sign from God Almighty to stay away from Satan. Interpretation of the name Ali in a dream for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about the name of a specific person in a dream is a sign of elevation and progress in society. If an unmarried girl sees the name Ali in a dream, this is a sign of success

title: What is the interpretation of giving life to dead leaves?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of giving life to dead leaves? What is the interpretation of giving life to a dead person? Giving money to a dead person in a dream changes depending on many things such as the condition of the person he sees and the details he sees. The dreamer, as in reality, is one of the most famous desires of any human being, and he often considers the interpretation of the presence of money in his dreams and the effects it brings, whether good or bad. You can follow an article on the interpretation of the living giving notes to the dead via: Otherwise, what is the interpretation of the dead giving notes to a living person to an unmarried woman? When an unmarried girl sees that the deceased gives her money in a dream, this dream indicates that she will get married as soon as possible or will soon receive a Something of value and value. However, if she sees in her dream that she is receiving money from the deceased, then this is an unpleasant dream for that girl and indicates the obstacles and fears that she will face in the future in addition to receiving money from the dead body. Receiving money in a dream for one girl is a symbol of ambition and the desire to fulfill desires and reach High positions.To see yourself receiving money from an unknown dead person in your dream means that you will have good opportunities in your future career and make abundant profits.The deceased taking money from the living in a dream. The interpretation of the living giving banknotes to the dead is a real vision, because the dead are in the world of reality and vision. The dead from here comes to the dreamer and needs money. In addition, this dream makes the dreamer feel anxious and confused about the condition of the deceased and his condition in the end, and from here he tries to search for an interpretation of this vision, and this interpretation changes according to the condition of the person who sees it. As it is interpreted. The situation in which the deceased appears. Ibn Shaheen explained that when the dreamer sees money given to the deceased in his dream and informs him of it, this dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve what he wants to happen. In a dream, it may represent an inheritance of a deceased person’s money soon. If a deceased person offers you money in a dream and you refuse it, then this dream indicates the dreamer’s bad luck because it indicates the loss of many opportunities and things. Interpretation of a dream about a living person asking for money from a deceased person. What is the interpretation of a living person giving a deceased person a paper? Cash If a married woman dreams that a deceased person gives her money, then this dream is good news for her, especially if this woman is already suffering from infertility, as this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. When you see a dead woman giving a pregnant woman silver coins, this indicates that she will go through difficult stages during pregnancy and will face many problems, and this dream will deal with them. Difficulty in childbirth.Dream interpretation scholars, when an unmarried girl sees money in a dream, this indicates that in the coming days she will achieve all her goals and earn a lot of money. If an unmarried woman sees paper money going out and buying it from a dead person in her dream, it means that the problems in her life are gone and there is success and a bright future. This is what he is waiting for. When the dreamer sees in his dream that the deceased asks for money and gives him money, he has made financial alms.

title: Interpretation of lunch in a dream - seeing eating lunch in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating lunch for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, and seeing eating at the table and buying lunch according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of eating lunch in a dream: In a dream, there is a monument to God Almighty’s saying: (Take our meal, we found a monument from this journey of ours). And whoever sees that he is asking for lunch will get tired. Sense: If a person dreams of eating lunch in a dream, this indicates fraud. If one dreams that he is asking for lunch, this means that he will be tired. To dream that you are eating lunch is a sign that you need to take a break from your work all the time. day. You should do this to avoid burnout. Eating lunch in a dream may indicate that you should not let small matters get in your way. Don't use them as excuses to stop you from doing what you need to do to succeed. Do you let trivial things prevent you from pursuing your goals? Dreams of food and drink Being invited to a meal may indicate that you are about to face some difficult situations. You will likely survive but have some losses. Eating lunch alone at home may mean that you are going through hard times. Eating an expensive meal brings you news of success and achievement of your goals. Eating lunch with someone indicates that you will have a serious dispute with another person. To dream that you are eating outside means that you feel safe and have no enemies. Cooking lunch may mean waiting for people to eat lunch. You look forward to spending time with them. This could mean that a pleasant surprise is coming your way. Food of any kind symbolizes energy, information and strength. Lunch in particular can symbolize a social event or business gathering. If you dream that you are eating lunch, this indicates that you should not let trivial matters interfere with your happiness or the way you pursue your goals. Eating lunch in a dream means getting rid of exhaustion from work. Dreaming of eating lunch represents what you are thinking or feeling as you enter the middle stage of a project or life cycle. How to keep yourself emotionally in the middle of dealing with a problem. YouTube Lunchtime Show Interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about clay

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing clay in a dream explains in detail that seeing clay in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates the imminent death. It also indicates in some dreams the energy and strength inherent in the dreamer, and eating clay in a dream indicates abundant health. Interpretations differed when seeing mud in a dream, so in this article we explain the most important interpretations received by the imams of interpretation. Interpretation of seeing clay in a dream in detail. See also: Hawk attack in a dream The interpretation of seeing clay by Ibn Sirin, one of the most famous imams of interpretation, who provided many different interpretations for an infinite number of visions, explains many clues, and the most important of these clues are the following: Seeing clay in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates goodness and energy. And the strength that the dreamer possesses. It also indicates fatigue as well as anxiety and exposure to some difficulties in life, especially if the dreamer walks in the mud. Seeing oneself eating mud in a dream symbolizes good health and a halal diet for the pioneer. Read more: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money in a dream. Interpretation of a vision Clay in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIt is worth noting that Ibn Shaheen is one of the imams of interpretation who provided interpretations and meanings for many visions, and we know the following in one of these interpretations, which is the interpretation of seeing clay in a dream in detail as follows: Imam Ibn Shaheen explains several different meanings for this vision as he indicates To the sadness and anguish that the dreamer will be exposed to in the coming days. Seeing him eating mud in a dream warns of poverty and great loss. Seeing mud in a dream indicates difficulties and problems that you face in life, work, or study. Seeing mud in a sinner’s dream indicates many sins. Deviation from the straight path. Collecting or extracting clay indicates an abundance of wealth and food. See also: The girl in a dream. The meaning of seeing mud for unmarried women. Also, the detailed interpretation of seeing mud in a dream for a single girl and a married woman shows many different interpretations, and perhaps the following are among the most important interpretations: They are as follows: Seeing mud for an unmarried girl in a dream indicates the approach of engagement and marriage to a poor man. It also symbolizes the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty in the event that she walks in the mud. Seeing a girl wearing shoes dirty with mud indicates goodness, happiness, and God’s reward in the near future. It indicates Mud in a married woman’s dream indicates an abundance of money, as well as good offspring that the woman is blessed with. Seeing one of her children falling in the mud in a dream means work and a prestigious position that the dreamer will obtain. It also indicates bearing the responsibilities and hardships that the dreamer will be exposed to. Stumbling on a hike symbolizes Mud refers to the many problems that the dreamer faces in life. Walking in mud for an unmarried girl also indicates many problems in marriage. You may also be interested in knowing: The river in a dream Mint in a pregnant woman’s dream Seeing a pregnant woman buying mint in a dream means good health and recovery from illness. Seeing yourself picking and collecting mint in a dream is...

title: Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman is one of the dreams that we see from time to time in our dreams, and it carries a large number of implications, including positive and negative. For this reason, today, through our article, we will point out the most important interpretations that the vision carries, based on what was stated by great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream a group of dogs barking violently, the vision symbolizes that she is surrounded by a number of hypocrites who talk behind her back about lying and everything bad in order to distort her. Reputation. If a married woman sees in her dream that a dog is groping next to her and it is calm, then the vision symbolizes that the dreamer is surrounded by spiteful people who are jealous of her, and what is in them is exactly the opposite. They appear in front of her. Carrying dogs in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is currently feeling a state of anxiety and confusion, knowing that she is taking a series of difficult steps that will completely change her life. The prominent researcher Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing dogs in a married woman’s dream is a clear sign of the need to be careful. With everyone around her, because she is surrounded by a large number of people who do not wish them well and do not reveal their secrets. Anyone. Seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that carry various interpretations, including positive and negative, and here are the most prominent interpretations mentioned: A married dog in a dream is an indication that he will be exposed to harm in the coming days. Great as a result of being exposed to an envious eye. Among the aforementioned interpretations is the emergence of a large number of problems between her and her husband, and perhaps the option of divorce will come in the end. Ibn Sirin confirmed that visions of a dog being carried are a bad omen, and symbolize that the dreamer is going through a difficult time and is causing her to fall short of her children and marital obligations. In general, as for seeing a black dog in a married woman’s dream, this is evidence that her children do not have a good personality, in addition to the lack of supervision over them. But if the married woman saw that she was playing with a small dog, then the vision here expresses the stability of her marital life until To some extent. Seeing black dogs in a married woman’s dream is a dream that symbolizes the presence of an immoral woman trying to approach her husband to divorce her. What is the interpretation of seeing a dog in a pregnant woman’s dream? Seeing dogs in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the dreams that does not symbolize a good omen at all, as it leads The dreamer is exposed to many problems in her life and is also difficult to reach. Any of its goals. Among the explanations given is the deterioration of the dreamer’s health condition, so he must follow the instructions of the treating physician as much as possible. If a pregnant woman sees that a dog is encircling her and licking her clothes, this indicates that she will be exposed to the evil eye and envy. Seeing a pregnant dog approaching her is a clear sign that the time of birth is approaching. Also, the birth will be mixed with a number of problems, but in the end it will go well. A dog bite in a pregnant woman’s dream is a clear sign of...

title: Interpretation of legs in a dream A bicycle made of gold or silver in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of legs for a pregnant woman for divorced women: If I buy clothes to wear, I dream that I am riding a bicycle that was worn by Ibn Sirin, by Imam al-Sadiq and others. The meaning of legs in a dream: Seeing a bicycle in a dream is a son. Whoever sees that he has a gold bracelet, then he will fall ill, or make a mistake in his religion, and if the legs are on the woman, then he is safe from fear, and if he is without a man, he will marry a noble and generous husband who sees good in him. Whoever dreams of owning a gold or silver bicycle is affected by anxiety, sadness, imprisonment, or chains. It is said: The legs of the two men are the smallest of them. No jewelry is suitable for a man in a dream except a necklace, pendant, ring and earrings. Whatever a woman sees in her legs as good or bad, the interpretation of that is in her husband, and if she does not have a husband, then he beautifies her for people according to the beauty and appearance of the legs. If the ankle is tight, then it is better than her husband and his kindness to her, and if the ankle is married and the body is loose and disorganized, then it is Loss for men and women, if the body. Of silver, then he also sees inferiority in his wife, and if the body is made of beads, then he appears to his brothers who have disappointed him. Whoever sees that he has a piece of gold on him is affected by distress or sadness, and a woman sees goodness or corruption in her legs, so the interpretation of that is in her husband, and legs in a dream High and wide. The beautiful small feet represent a son wearing golden bracelets in a dream, it means a serious illness or that one may commit great sins. However, if a woman sees herself wearing aprons in a dream, it means that she is safe and protected. If she is unmarried, this means that she will marry a kind and generous person with whom she will live happily and contentedly. If a man sees himself wearing a pair of golden anklets in a dream, it means adversity, distress, or imprisonment. It is said that legs in a dream represent shackles in waking life, unlike a wedding ring or a necklace. What a woman sees in putting beauty or perfection on her legs in a dream will be reflected in her husband. If she is single, the bike will reflect her adornments or makeup. In a dream, small feet also represent honor, wealth, dignity, and beauty. Seeing small feet in a dream. As for the interpretation of seeing small feet in a dream, if the dreamer is a woman, this is safety for her from what she fears and dreads. We are now dealing with the interpretation of feet in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. And Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of feet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Muhammad bin Shirin said that a bicycle in a dream is a disease or debt, God forbid, if it is made of gold. From a generous, generous man who washes them with a lot of kindness and blessings. Interpretation of feet in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. The interpretation of the scholar and translator Al-Nabulsi did not differ much from the interpretation of Ibn Sirin in what he narrated about the interpretation of seeing bibs in a dream, but he added to it, saying that the bicycle in general is related to seeing it in a dream. A man’s dream is worry, grief, sadness, debts, imprisonment, and illness. An anklet of gold or silver. To see a necklace, a necklace, a ring, or an earring, then seeing her with him is good and worthy of praise. As for seeing aprons in her dream, it is a sign of her husband. Interpretation of the feet in
